m_szDocTitle: 16 unique products made in the southeast Valley
m_szDocSumamry: FacebookEmail Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest 16 unique products made in the southeast Valley Shoulder-fired rockets: What: Nammo Talley, Mesa. Details: The company's M72A9 Light Assault Weapon (LAW) is billed as lightweight, accurate, and powerful enough to breach walls in light clad buildings or destroy enemy bunkers. Well-suited for urbanized settings, the launcher fires rockets that can penetrate single brick/concrete block. Nammo Talley also produces the US Armyâ€™s M141 Bunker Defeat Munition (BDM), which can be used against reinforced concrete structures, heavily fortified buildings an
